typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string,
		indicator as string,
		weekly_count as string,
		year_week as string,
		rate_14_day as string,
		cumulative_count as string,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(continent == 'America' && not(isNull(country_code))) ~> FilterAmerica
FilterAmerica select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code,
		continent,
		population,
		indicator,
		weekly_count,
		year_week,
		rate_14_day,
		cumulative_count,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
